thread.title: BRIEF-Camsing International Updates On Potential Litigation | Reuters

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Camsing International Updates On Potential Litigation | Reuters

organizations.name: brief-camsing international updates on potential litigation | reuters

text:
May 17 (Reuters) - Camsing International Holding Ltd :
* NOT AWARE THAT POW! ENTERTAINMENT HAS BEEN SERVED WITH ANY DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO A POTENTIAL LITIGATION
* IS CURRENTLY SEEKING LEGAL ADVICE ON POTENTIAL LITIGATION AND MAY TAKE APPROPRIATE LEGAL ACTION, IF APPROPRIATE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
